mapper.update: UPDATE cart SET cust_id =#{cust_id},book_id =#{book_id}, b_count=#{b_count}, date=#{date},book_price=#{book_price},book_bname=#{book_bname},book_img=#{book_img} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT ca.cart_id, ca.cust_id, cu.name as cust_name, bo.b_name as book_name, bo.price as book_price, ca.b_count, ca.date as rdate FROM cart ca INNER JOIN cust cu ON ca.cust_id = cu.cust_id INNER JOIN book bo ON ca.book_id = bo.book_id WHERE ca.cust_id = #{cu.cust_id}
